description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国女画家，满洲正红旗人。
description.en: A female painter of the People's Republic of China, of Manchu Plain Red Banner origin.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，胡絜青的丈夫。在文化大革命期间受迫害自杀。
description.en: Chinese writer, husband of Hu Jieqing. He committed suicide after being persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，曾对胡絜青的绘画产生影响。
description.en: A Chinese painter who influenced Hu Jieqing's painting.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，曾对胡絜青的绘画产生影响。
description.en: A Chinese painter who influenced Hu Jieqing's painting.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，曾对胡絜青的绘画产生影响。
description.en: A Chinese painter who influenced Hu Jieqing's painting.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家。胡絜青是该国知名女画家。
description.en: A country in East Asia. Hu Jieqing was a renowned female painter from this country.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的专业绘画艺术研究与创作机构。
description.en: A professional art research and creation institution for painting located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国全国性的美术家组织。
description.en: A national organization for artists in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国全国性的书法家组织。
description.en: A national organization for calligraphers in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的组成人员，是一种政治身份和职务。
description.en: A member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which is a political status and position.

description.zh-cn: 老舍与胡絜青的儿子。
description.en: The son of Lao She and Hu Jieqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一场始于1966年的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China that began in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。胡絜青于此地病逝。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China. Hu Jieqing passed away here.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一，是一种社会组织形式。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty, a form of social organization.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青是老舍的妻子。2005年8月23日，夫妇二人在去世后合葬于北京八宝山革命公墓。
description.en: Hu Jieqing was Lao She's wife. On August 23, 2005, the couple was jointly buried at the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery in Beijing after their deaths.

description.zh-cn: 舒乙是胡絜青的儿子。
description.en: Shu Yi is the son of Hu Jieqing.

description.zh-cn: 舒乙是老舍的儿子。2005年，他将父亲在文革受难时所穿血衣的残片放入其骨灰盒中。
description.en: Shu Yi is the son of Lao She. In 2005, he placed a fragment of the blood-stained clothing his father wore during his persecution in the Cultural Revolution into his cinerary casket.

degree.en: Department of Chinese Language and Literature

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青于1931年自北京师范大学国文系毕业。
description.en: Hu Jieqing graduated from the Department of Chinese Language and Literature at Beijing Normal University in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青曾受画家汪采白的影响。
description.en: Hu Jieqing was influenced by the painter Wang Caibai.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青曾受画家孙诵昭的影响。
description.en: Hu Jieqing was influenced by the painter Sun Songzhao.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青曾受画家杨仲子的影响。
description.en: Hu Jieqing was influenced by the painter Yang Zhongzi.

description.zh-cn: 1958年，胡絜青受聘于北京中国画院（今北京画院），任一级美术师。
description.en: In 1958, Hu Jieqing was employed by the Beijing Chinese Painting Academy (now Beijing Painting Academy) as a First-class Artist.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青曾任第五、六、七届全国政协委员。
description.en: Hu Jieqing served as a member of the 5th, 6th, and 7th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 老舍在1966年文化大革命期间遭受迫害，随后自杀身亡。
description.en: Lao She was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution in 1966 and subsequently committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 舒乙设计了其父母老舍与胡絜青的合葬陵墓，并亲自将他们合葬。
description.en: Shu Yi designed the joint tomb for his parents, Lao She and Hu Jieqing, and personally buried them together.

description.zh-cn: 舒乙设计了其父母老舍与胡絜青的合葬陵墓，并亲自将他们合葬。
description.en: Shu Yi designed the joint tomb for his parents, Lao She and Hu Jieqing, and personally buried them together.

description.zh-cn: 胡絜青是满洲正红旗人。
description.en: Hu Jieqing was of the Manchu Plain Red Banner.
